Stretching along 57kms of pristine coastline, it offers iconic beaches like Surfers Paradise and Broadbeach. Beyond the shore, lush hinterland rainforests beckon adventure-seekers with hiking trails and waterfalls. Thriving nightlife, world-class dining, and vibrant shopping precincts like Pacific Fair and Harbour Town cater to every taste. Additionally, theme parks like Warner Bros. Movie World and Dreamworld provide endless entertainment. The Gold Coast truly epitomises the ultimate holiday destination for relaxation and adventure alike. Accommodation Rhapsody Resort + Natural Bridge Glow Worm Night Tour (4 stars) Rhapsody Resort offers stylish, self-contained apartments in a prime location just steps from Surfers Paradise Beach. Enjoy sweeping ocean or hinterland views from floor-to-ceiling windows, modern interiors, and full kitchen facilities. The resort features a rooftop terrace, gym, and BBQ area, perfect for relaxing after a day of exploring. With cafes, shops, and Glink tram access nearby, Rhapsody is an ideal base for your Gold Coast getaway. Natural Bridge Glow Worm Night Tour - Discover the magical glow worm colony at Natural Bridge on a guided night tour through the lush rainforest of Springbrook National Park. Witness thousands of bioluminescent glow worms light up the cave like a starry sky, while learning about the area's unique ecosystem. A serene, unforgettable experience just a short drive from the Gold Coast.
